mashup.title: Upload a mashup

genres.description: Genres are selected according to the genre of the original track, but this does not apply to the following categories:
genres.memes: If a mashup made heavy use of memes, such as,
genres.megamashup: If a really extensive number of different tracks and memes has been used
genres.cover: If a mashup was live recorded with your voice
genres.soundclown: If a mashup is not really a musical composition
genres.morph: If a mashup made heavy use of the “morphing“ effect
genres.shitpost: If a mashup was created purely as a joke without much work on it

mashup.link: Link to the base/alt version (if exists)

agreement.title: User agreement
agreement.welcome: Welcome to the VKontakte Site, an online resource that helps you keep in touch with your old and new friends. The VKontakte site (vk.com, vk.ru) is a networking project that brings people together based on where they study or work.
agreement.privacy: You can also read the VK.com Website Privacy Policy.
agreement.civil-code: The Site Administration provides you with access to use the VKontakte Site and its functionality on the terms and conditions that are the subject of these Terms of Use of the VKontakte Site. In this regard, you should carefully read the terms and conditions of these Rules, which are considered by the Website Administration as a public offer in accordance with Article 437 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation.
agreement.term-content-1: is a social network known under the name 'VKontakte', placed on the site in the Internet at the address: VK.com, VK.ru (including all levels of these domains, both functioning as of the date of acceptance by the User of these Rules and launched and put into operation during the entire period of its validity) and available to the User through the site, mobile version of the site, applications and other resources, representing a result of intellectual activity in the form of a computer program. The social network is represented in objective form by a set of data and commands and generated audiovisual displays (including graphic images and user interface), (hereinafter - data and commands), intended for functioning of computers and mobile devices in order to obtain a certain result in the form of organization of the social network functionality. The aggregate of data and commands consists of activated and non-activated data and commands. 1.2. Non-activated data and commands are data, commands and generated audiovisual displays that allow to increase the number of virtual values used within the functionality of the Website. The conditions of granting by the Administration to the User of the right to use inactivated data and commands are defined in the license agreement, which is an integral part of these Rules, the current version of which is freely available on the Internet at the address: https://vk.com/licence, concluded by the Administration of the Site with the User.

term-content-2.t1: 2.1. These Rules of Use of the VKontakte Website (formerly and hereinafter - the Rules) are developed by the Website Administration and determine the terms of use and development of the Website, its services, as well as the rights and obligations of its Users and the Administration. The Rules also apply to relations related to the rights and interests of third parties who are not Users of the Site, but whose rights and interests may be affected by the actions of the Users of the Site.
term-content-2.t2: 2.2. These Rules are a legally binding agreement between the User and the Website Administration, the subject of which is the provision by the Website Administration to the User of access to the use of the Website and its functionality. In addition to these Rules, the agreement between the User and the Website Administration includes all special documents governing the provision of access to the use of certain functionalities of the Website (including its inactivated data, commands and services), placed in the relevant sections of the Website and/or services on the Website.
term-content-2.t3: 2.3. The User is obliged to fully familiarize with these Rules before registering on the Site. Registration of the User on the Site means full and unconditional acceptance of these Rules by the User in accordance with Article 438 of the Civil Code of the Russian Federation.
term-content-2.t4: 2.4. These Rules may be changed and/or amended by the Website Administration unilaterally with notification within 3 (three) working days from the date of changes and/or amendments. These Rules are an open and publicly available document. The current version of the Rules is available on the Internet at the following address: https://vk.com/terms. The Website Administration recommends Users to regularly check the terms of these Rules for changes and/or additions. Continued use of the Site by the User after changes and/or amendments to these Rules means acceptance and consent of the User with such changes and/or amendments.

password.rules: The password must contain 8 - 32 characters and may contain: uppercase and lowercase latin letters, digits, and special characters.
